```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
library(skimr)
```

```{r}
library(readr)
gold <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/simonmig10/M3/main/gold.csv")
```

```{r}
gold_diff_5min=gold %>% select(Address, min_5) 

gold_diff_10min=gold %>% select(Address, min_10)

gold_diff_15min=gold %>% select(Address, min_15)



#join the variables 

total_gold=gold %>% 
  count(Address)%>%
  select(Address) %>% 
  left_join(gold_diff_5min) %>%
  left_join(gold_diff_10min, by = c("Address"))%>%
  left_join(gold_diff_15min, by = c("Address"))#%>%
  #replace_na(list(gold_dif_5min=0, gold_dif_10min= 0, gold_dif_15min=0))

```
